overview: A young, desperate ventriloquist arrives to an audition only to be turned away with just a brief glance. Tenaciously, the ventriloquist fights for his opportunity to perform and when he gets it, he is elated. But soon, he discovers a dark secret about the audition..the puppets are actually auditioning him for something far more sinister than a simple stage show.

production_companies.name: Shockfest Horror Factory, Sepulture Productions, Claveria Caliber Cinema

title: Puppets
